name: Son, you have no life
description:
Mario is known in the mushroom kingdom for not caring a lot about what's around him, but in this grey day, he decides to find out why everyone is so... sad and empty, but he  doesn't know that what he's going to discover is something far worse.

Controls (you can also read them in the README, there are some secret commands there, too. Controller should work as well)

Left and right arrows to move

Up and down arrows to move the camera up and down (this will only happen in level 2)

Space to jump

L ctrl to run and close messages

I hope you'll enjoy this small game as much as I did making it.
